name: Who Played These Characters II? Multiple Choice Quiz | Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which Oscar nominated actress portrayed Cathy Whitaker, Laura Brown, and Amber Waves?
questions.explanation:
Julianne Moore.

	Julianne portrayed Cathy Whitaker in the 2002 drama "Far From Heaven".  She played Laura Brown in the Oscar nominated film "The Hours".  Her memorable performance as the porn star, Amber Waves, earned Julianne her first Oscar nomination.  As of 2003 she has been nominated for four Oscars.

questions.text: Which of the following character actors has played the roles of Sgt. Michael Horvath, Lt. Col. Danny McKnight, and Sgt. Earl Sistern?
questions.explanation:
Tom Sizemore.

	Tom played Sgt. Michael Horvath in the 1998 war drama "Saving Private Ryan", Lt. Col. Danny McKnight in the 2001 war drama "Black Hawk Down", and Sgt. Earl Sistern in the 2001 romantic drama "Pearl Harbor".

questions.text: Which of the following actions stars has played John Cutter, Bobby Rayburn, and Simon Phoenix?
questions.explanation:
Wesley Snipes.

	Wesley played John Cutter in the 1992 action flick "Passenger 57", Bobby Rayburn in the 1996 action drama "The Fan", and Simon Phoenix in the 1993 action comedy "Demolition Man".

questions.text: Which comedic actor has portrayed Ryan Turner, James Russell, and Carl Taylor?
questions.explanation:
Charlie Sheen.

	Charlie played Ryan Turner in the 2001 comedy "Good Advice", James Russell in the 1997 comedy "Money Talks", and Carl Taylor in the 1990 comedy "Men at Work".

questions.text: Which Hollywood hunk has played the characters Dickie Greenleaf, Jerome Eugene Morrow, and W.P. Inman?
questions.explanation:
Jude Law.

	Jude played Dickie Greenleaf and received an Oscar nomination in the 1999 thriller "The Talented Mr. Ripley".  His role of Jerome Eugene Morrow is from the 1997 thriller "Gattaca".  The most recent character listed, W.P. Inman, comes from the Oscar nominated film from 2003, "Cold Mountain".

questions.text: Which of the following English actresses has played the characters of Evelyn Johnson, Sara Thomas, and Flora Poste?
questions.explanation:
Kate Beckinsale.

	Kate played Nurse Lt. Evelyn Johnson in the 2001 blockbuster "Pearl Harbor".  She played Sara Thomas in the 2001 romantic comedy "Serendipty".  She played Flora Poste in the television film from 1995 "Cold Comfort Farm".

questions.text: Which Hollywood veteran has played the roles of Steve Burns, Carlito Brigante, and Arthur Kirkland?
questions.explanation:
Al Pacino.

	Al played Steve Burns in the 1980 serial murder flick "Cruising".  He played Carlito Brigante in the 1993 film "Carlito's Way".  The role of Arthur Kirkland is from the 1979 drama "...And Justice for All".

questions.text: Which of the following scream queens has played Helen Tasker, Tess Coleman, and Rona Mace?
questions.explanation:
Jamie Lee Curtis.

	Jamie Lee played Helen Tasker in the 1994 action comedy "True Lies".  She played the role of Tess Coleman in the 2003 comedy remake "Freaky Friday".  She played the role of Rona Mace in the 2000, little-seen comedy "Drowning Mona".

questions.text: Which of the following 80's hunks has played Tim Pierson, Michael Ryan, and Jim Halsey?
questions.explanation:
C. Thomas Howell

	C. Thomas Howell played the role of Tim Pierson in the 1984 drama "Grandview, U.S.A.".  He played the role of Michael Ryan in the 1985 romantic comedy "Secret Admirer".  He played Jim Halsey in the 1986 horror film "The Hitcher" and he reprised his role in the 2003 sequel "Hitcher II:  I've Been Waiting".

questions.text: Which of the following "Buffy the Vampire Slayer" stars has played the popular film characters of Alice Bloom, Missy Pantone, and Emma Carlson?
questions.explanation:
Eliza Dushku.

	Eliza was Alice Bloom in the 1992 drama "That Night".  She played Missy Pantone in the 2000 cheerleading film "Bring It On".  She played Emma Carlson in the 1995 divorce drama "Bye Bye, Love".
